blog.name: weirdandwackypokefusions
blog.title: Well that's strange!
blog.description:
Welcome!  I create, using the all-mighty classic Microsoft XP Paint, my own pokemon fusions. All the sprites come from pokestadium and usually people on deviantart/ the xy/sun&moon sprite project. I don't own any of the sprite used, I just fuse them! 
REQUESTS ARE OPEN! Ask Box: 3/15.
PLEASE FEEL FREE TO DRAW MY FUSIONS!!  I absolutely love it when people draw them! There's no need to ask either! Just make sure you tag me so them I can see it!
I hope you enjoy my fusions!

summary: Giramin Giratina and Shaymin fusion Dragon/Grass Type Ability: Pressure Hidden Ability: Purified Chaos - Bounces all status back...
caption:
Giramin

Giratina and Shaymin fusion

Dragon/Grass Type

Ability: Pressure

Hidden Ability: Purified Chaos - Bounces all status back to the opponent.

Stats: HP - 130, Atk - 120, Def - 130, SpA - 120, SpD - 130, Spe - 110

The Gentle Giant Pokemon

An unlikely fusion, Giratina and Shaymin only fuse when absolutely necessary.  Giramin is actually really gentle and wanders from the distortion world to the real world  Sometimes, Giratina’s chaotic energy can take over and lead Giramin on a path of destruction however it usually clears the mess made.  

Request for anon. I hope you like it!

summary: The burned tower was once a breathtaking sight, built as a symbol of the friendship between people and Pokémon. When the fire...
body:
The burned tower was once a breathtaking sight, built as a symbol of the friendship between people and Pokémon.

When the fire struck, all but three unknown Pokémon were able to escape the flames. They died amongst the tower’s debris, succumbing to the smoke and embers.

It was only after the fire was killed that the townspeople of Ecruteak City were able to grieve the charred, lost bodies of the deceased Pokémon.

They say that during that tragic moment of mourning was when the darkened sky was suddenly brought alight.

A mighty, bird-like beast appeared, their very presence seeming to clear the smoke from the sky. They cast their shadow upon Ecruteak City, the beast so large that they blocked out the sun like an eclipse. But their vibrant feathers reflected the sunlight like crystal prisms, and the burned tower was bathed in the light of the most beautiful rainbow.

No one can quite explain how Ho-Oh was able to give life to the deceased Pokémon. But Ho-Oh’s rainbow is mighty, and the Pokémon were imbued with this power. Whether it was some sort of legendary evolution, or simply the price of resurrection, may never be known.

What we do know, however, is that the light of Ho-Oh’s rainbow was so vibrant, so gorgeous, and so pure, even the three Pokémon who had perished within the flames reared their heads to gaze upon Ho-Oh.

All beheld Ho-Oh and the three Pokémon as they witnessed the ashes of the tower rise and breathe.

These three Pokémon were undoubtably powerful.

And although it was a gift Ho-Oh had given, it is common for us to fear the unknown.

The villagers did not welcome the resurrected Pokémon. They reacted out of fear, and violence ensued.

But the Pokémon did not fight back. They simply turned their backs and ran off into the wild.

They were not afraid of the villagers. They were ashamed.

Ashamed that the townsfolk mourned their deaths but threatened their lives.

Disappointed that the people of Ecruteak City had taken Ho-Oh’s gift so ignorantly, Ho-Oh took their leave as well. Thus marked the day that the race of man lost Ho-Oh’s respect.

Ho-Oh was never again seen by the eyes of man. According to the elders of Ecruteak, Ho-Oh will only appear once more to a trainer whose heart is gold and soul is silver, to a pure being who can redeem the people of Johto.

Perhaps one day, such a trainer will finally appear.

summary: Color instead of type- black pokemon?
question: Color instead of type- black pokemon?
answer:
Pokemon!!

Mightyena! It doesn’t matter how gorgeous or well-designed the new pokemon or other pokemon are, there is always a part of my brain that goes hehe dog.

Houndoom. Again, hehe dog

Staraptor. Looks like a serious anime rival.

Salazzle. Yeah…

Pyukumuku. round slimy friend.

Luxray. Again with the pokemon I have a soft spot for! also Cat

summary: I thought I wasn't going to be able to go see detective pikachu because my friends didn't have time to go with me. My brother...
body: I thought I wasn’t going to be able to go see detective pikachu because my friends didn’t have time to go with me. My brother just invited me to go see the movie with him and his friends, and I’m SO EXCITED I’ll finally get to see it!!! It’s literally the last night it’s in theatres!!

blog.description: Hi there! Prof. Cypress here! I am striving to become a Pokemon Professor, so if you have any questions about your Pokemon, don’t be afraid to ask. I can also take care of your Pokemon if you feel that you can’t take care of them. (RP/Ask/Headcanon Blog)

summary: The three green spheres found at the end of Sudowoodo’s arms are actual pure jade spheres. They are completely sanded and...
body: The three green spheres found at the end of Sudowoodo’s arms are actual pure jade spheres. They are completely sanded and covered to make it not look shiny and fake. This actually helps the Sudowoodos not look less suspicious to humans, as well as not make it a prime target for Pokémon who like to steal shiny objects like Sneasels and Murkrows. Because the spheres weigh over one hundred pounds, this is why Sudowoodo’s arms are very strong and able to hold them up overtime.

summary: Steel type~
question: Steel type~
answer:
Pokemon!!

Aegislash. Cmon. this is the IDEAL.

Cobalion. Don’t really like the weird bendiness to the limbs but I do approve of a big cat.

Lucario. Appealing design and emotional story arc.

Aggron. There was a free pokemon game I used to play all the time and I would always pick up a little Aron, train it up, and keep it in my team all the way to the end. I have soft spot for these guys.

Durant. I had a pokemon card with this lil guy and he just seemed so happy to be crawling around doing ant stuff.

Bastiodon. He looks so happy to be alive and existing. I love his face.

summary: clefable is one of those pokemon i intially didnt think much of, but i like to limit myself to using pokemon i havent tried...
body:
clefable is one of those pokemon i intially didnt think much of, but i like to limit myself to using pokemon i havent tried before whenever i do a run, and clefable ended up being a surprise mvp when i played Let’s Go 🥰

heres a process timelapse also!

summary: I drew Lucario before actually watching the Pokémon movie featuring him and goddam I did not like that ending. It was supposed...
body:
I drew Lucario before actually watching the Pokémon movie featuring him and goddam I did not like that ending. It was supposed to be fanart, not preparation for a memorial.

In other news I’m having a memorial later.

blog.name: prof-cypress-headcanons
blog.title: Professor-In-Training Marshall Cypress
blog.description: Hi there! Prof. Cypress here! I am striving to become a Pokemon Professor, so if you have any questions about your Pokemon, don’t be afraid to ask. I can also take care of your Pokemon if you feel that you can’t take care of them. (RP/Ask/Headcanon Blog)

summary: During total lunar eclipses, Clefables will come out of their caves earlier than usual, mainly a little before sundown, and...
body: During total lunar eclipses, Clefables will come out of their caves earlier than usual, mainly a little before sundown, and prepare a dancing ritual. Once the total lunar eclipse is in motion, they will finish their ritual dance, and spread their arms out wide, allowing their souls to be taken by ghost Pokémon like Gengar. This is why there are not many Clefables found in the wild.

reblog.comment: During total lunar eclipses, Clefables will come out of their caves earlier than usual, mainly a little before sundown, and prepare a dancing ritual. Once the total lunar eclipse is in motion, they will finish their ritual dance, and spread their arms out wide, allowing their souls to be taken by ghost Pokémon like Gengar. This is why there are not many Clefables found in the wild.

This is why there are not many Clefables found in the wild.
